com.knowledgeplayers.grar.structure.part.Part

type
interface
implements
native.events.IEventDispatcher

Instance Variables

activities(default,null) : IntHash<com.knowledgeplayers.grar.structure.activity.Activity>

display : String

file(default,null) : String

id : Int

inventory(default,null) : Array<String>

isDone : Bool

items(default,null) : Array<com.knowledgeplayers.grar.structure.part.dialog.item.Item>

name : String

options(default,null) : Hash<String>

parts(default,null) : IntHash<Part>

soundLoop : nme.media.Sound

Instance Methods

activitiesCount() : Int

returns
the number of activities in the part

getAllParts() : Array<Part>

returns
all the sub-part of this part

getNextItem() : Null<com.knowledgeplayers.grar.structure.part.dialog.item.Item>

returns
the next item in the part or null if the part is over

hasParts() : Bool

returns
true if it has sub-part
Tell if this part has sub-part or not

init(xml : haxe.xml.Fast, ?filePath : String) : Void

parameters
xml : a Fast xml object with initialization data
filePath : the path to the part file structure
Initialize a part with a xml structure

isDialog() : Bool

returns
true if this part is a dialog
Tell if this part is a dialog

next() : Null<Part>

returns
the part following this one or null if there is none

partsCount() : Int

returns
the number of sub-part

start(?forced : Bool) : Part

parameters
forced : Force the part to start, even if it's already done
returns
this part
Start this part

toString() : String

returns
a string-based representation of the part
